title: [Cancer] Scientists from the Tokyo University of Science have made a breakthrough in the development of potential drugs that can kill cancer cells. They have discovered a method of synthesizing organic compounds that are four times more fatal to cancer cells and leave non-cancerous cells unharmed.

[Health] Women in a Chinese matrilineal society sometimes known as the "kingdom of women" had significantly lower blood pressure and markers of inflammation compared to those living in a patrilineal society. The results point to a "protective effect" of autonomy on health and wellbeing.
